Scripts.OnLoad: Mixin(self, PVPLadderTabsMixin, PVPLadderCategoryMixin) self.isBigTab = true self:TabOnLoad()
Scripts.OnEnter:
local tooltipText = self:GetAttribute("tooltipText")
if tooltipText then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(_G[tooltipText]) GameTooltip:Show() end
if self.localizedClassName then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.localizedClassName) GameTooltip:Show() end
if self.raceName then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.raceName) GameTooltip:Show() end
if self.classLocalizedName then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.classLocalizedName) GameTooltip:Show() end
if self.factionName then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.factionName) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnClick: if PVPLadderFrame:GetDetailsPlayerIndex() == self.index then PVPLadderFrame:ShowDetailsFrame(nil) else PVPLadderFrame:ShowDetailsFrame(self.index) end

Scripts.OnLoad:
if not self:GetParent().playerLeftButtons then self:GetParent().playerLeftButtons = {} end
self:GetParent().playerLeftButtons[#self:GetParent().playerLeftButtons + 1] = self

if not self:GetParent().playerRightButtons then self:GetParent().playerRightButtons = {} end
self:GetParent().playerRightButtons[#self:GetParent().playerRightButtons + 1] = self

Scripts.OnEnter: if self.raceName then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.raceName) GameTooltip:Show() end
if self.classLocalizedName then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.classLocalizedName) GameTooltip:Show() end
if self.factionName then GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText(self.factionName) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnLoad: self.LoadingSpinner.showRetrievingText = true self.LoadingSpinner.Text:SetText(STORE_WAIT_SERVER_RESPONSE) self.LoadingSpinner.Text:SetTextColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b) self.LoadingSpinner.Dots:SetTextColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b)

Scripts.OnTextChanged:
local text = self:GetText() SearchBoxTemplate_OnTextChanged(self)
self.autoCompleteParams = AUTOCOMPLETE_LIST.ALL self.addHighlightedText = true AutoComplete_Update(self, text, self:GetUTF8CursorPosition())
if not self:GetParent().SearchButton.Delay then self:GetParent().SearchButton:SetEnabled(#text >= 2) end

Scripts.OnClick:
self.StartDelay = function() self.Delay = 10 self:Disable() self:SetText(self.Delay)
if self.timer then self.timer:Cancel() self.timer = nil end
self.timer = C_Timer:NewTicker(1, function() self.Delay = self.Delay - 1
if self.Delay == 0 then self:Enable() self:SetText(SEARCH) self.Delay = nil else self:SetText(self.Delay) end end, self.Delay) end
local text = self:GetParent().SearchBox:GetText() local selectedCategroy = self:GetParent():GetParent():GetParent():GetParent():GetSelectedCategory()
if #text >= 2 then AutoComplete_HideIfAttachedTo(self:GetParent().SearchBox) SendServerMessage("ACMSG_PVP_LADDER_GET_SEARCH", string.format("%d:%s", selectedCategroy, text)) end

Scripts.OnLoad: self.LoadingSpinner.showRetrievingText = true self.LoadingSpinner.Text:SetText(STORE_WAIT_SERVER_RESPONSE) self.LoadingSpinner.Text:SetTextColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b) self.LoadingSpinner.Dots:SetTextColor(HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.r, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.g, HIGHLIGHT_FONT_COLOR.b)
